newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico nominal GDP 2.383 trillion pesos at end Q2.
newsitem.headline: Mexico nominal GDP 2.383 trillion pesos at end Q2.

text.p: Mexico's nominal second-quarter Gross Domestic Product (GDP) was 2.383 trillion pesos at the end of the second quarter of 1996, the government statistics institute INEGI said Friday.

"In the second quarter of this year, nominal GDP at market prices and expressed as an annual amount, was 2.383 trillion current pesos," INEGI said in a statement. "In the second quarter of 1996 GDP in real terms thus grew 7.2 percent and the implicit price deflator by 28.4 percent compared to the same year-ago quarter."
Mexico had already announced the 7.2 percent second-quarter GDP growth figure earlier this week.
